msg: Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
labelField now special cases the empty string to mean that no label value will be obtained from the associated data.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fixing a bunch of List issues:
- Scrolling now interacts with List's selection, even if it isn't the List's own scroller that is scrolling
- the touchInteractionEnd event is now bubbling as documented
- Remove a hack in Scroller aorund updateAfterEvent() because I figured out what the underlying bug is around scaleX/scaleY==0 affecting the thumb position for sliders and scrollbars
- Fixing some caret issues (though some still remain and need to be worked out)
- Fix a padding issue for MobileItemRenderer
Tests run: checkintests, mustella Slider, Scrollbar, List
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

SDK-27686: MobileIconItemRenderer needs to handle null items in the data for message, icon, and label better than it currently does, and it needs to make sure that when encountering a null that a recycled item renderer resets appropriately.

SDK-27371: ListBase now keeps track of when it should play transitions better.  This is a pretty large change in how we deal with transitions, but we are now keeping track of when caret or selection occurs and whether it occurred due to item recycling or not.
Reviewer: Glenn for MIIR change, Hans for ListBase change
Tests run: checkintests, mustella List, ButtonBar, spark/effects/Regression/test/CatalystMatrixTransitions_test, spark/effects/Regression/test/CatalystMatrixSequences_test
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository

Fixing up logic for Scroller determining when it can scroll horizontally and/or vertically.  This code has moved in to ScrollerLayout(), and the properties are now set in ScorllerLayout.udl() rather than trying to directly calculate it in another method.
Transferred from the Adobe Open Source Subversion Repository
Fixed an issue in ListBase where an RTE would occur if a list switched layouts between states without a default layout defined.
